snippet.title: BLINDFIRE - Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the shadows with Blindfire, a brand new FPS challenge where every match tests your survival skills. In this new experience, you’ll be thrown into an arena where relying on sight won’t be enough. Sharp ears and quick thinking are your best allies. Will you boldly make the first move to seize victory, or wait in the darkness as your others to expose themselves? Every decision counts, and in the end, it's all about emerging as the last one standing.

Blindfire is now in early access on Xbox Series S|X, Steam, and Epic Games, with PlayStation 5 coming soon.

Xbox Series S|X: https://gsght.com/c/1lar7i
Steam: https://gsght.com/c/20d1xh
Epic Games: https://gsght.com/c/rup0kr

Join our Discord Server and visit our Website to be in the loop!

Discord: https://gsght.com/c/hduxe7 
Website: https://gsght.com/c/y53yri
